2017 CREW Network Winter Leadership Summit

Register Now

Feb. 9-10 2017  |  Hollywood, CAView Attendees

About the leadership summit

These summits serve as CREW Network’s “leadership laboratories,” where you can receive leadership training, participate in association business, and demonstrate your skills in a supportive environment. Chapter delegates are required to attend, but you’re encouraged to participate if you have an interest in developing your leadership skills, expanding your network outside of your local market or becoming more involved at the local and CREW Network levels. Nonmembers are invited to attend as well.

Register NowView Past Events
